item.description:
Networking Extravaganza!

Join us to celebrate our 2nd birthday! Snacks, refreshments, prizes and more!

Bring tons of business cards - we'll provide lots of creative opportunities to network.


5:30 - 6:15 PM - POWER HOUR - QuickBooks for Real Estate Investors - For Boston AREIA Members Only
6:30 PM - Meeting
Location: Best Western, 380 Winter Street, Waltham, MA
Free to BostonAREIA members, visitors and meetup members $25 at the door

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association August Meetup
